TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, It now shrinks everytime and yours will grow.

I wish for a helicopter

Granted, but it is a copy of a stock helicopter from KSP, and trust me, while hilarity ensues when you fly one of them in KSP, its not very funny when you try and fly it in real life

I wish that I had a hot tub

Edited June 4, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but, er, well, it might be... too hot? For some? Nevermind just go ahead and stick your face in it.

I wish for a pony.

Granted but it is a Mlp pony that thinks your strange ,and kills you then takes over earth.

I wish for some tea ,and a rocking chair to watch the pony take over earth.

Granted, the tea tee-bags you. UNH for da win!

I wish I had a samurai sword to defend myself against the pony.

Granted, but it is plastic.

I wish for a sunny day, an unpoisined, non flammable, non exploding, non loopholed, dead, cream soda and a chair to sit down and watch the apocolypse in.

Granted, you're just about to take a sip of your cream soda and the apocalpyse engulfs you.

I wish for lilac bushes with red flowers!

Granted, you will be buried alive with lilacs!

I wish for a pop tart.

Granted. As a bonus, it's on fire!

I wish for a second chance to drink my cream soda in heaven.

Granted. But it's diet.

I wish for a good book to read.

Granted, but I have revenge on my diet cream soda by killing you 5 seconds before you open it.

I wish for a cream soda.

Granted, but you have to share it with me. I backwash xD

I wish for an authentic phaser

Granted, but I shoot you with it.

I wish for a pie.

Granted. It has living breathing pooping blackbirds in it. 24 of them, even

I wish for an intact living cute kitten in my lap

Granted...its homicidal

I wish to be charsmatic

Granted. you are now smothered in the gender that you are not attracted to, and they all want in your pants.

I wish for a dozen wishes

Granted, but I get to use them for you, its all in the fine print.

I wish for a pop tart that has no surprising "bonuses" in it. Oh, and it has to be blueberry.

Granted, but I read it wrong and it's a poop-tart instead.

I wish for this wish not to be a lie.

Granted. Its an ugly truth.

I wish for the ability to change my eye color.

Granted. But only once, to puce

I wish I could be one of the characters in any of my stories.

Granted, but I add to the story and this character explodes during the story.

I wish for less ninjaness up in the past three posts.

Granted, you ninja'd ME though.

I wish that this posting rage that's going on right now would go slower.

Granted, the thread dies and no one has any fun at all

I wish for a pony!

Granted, but it gets hit by a car which is hit by a train. Then it's nuked from orbit, it's the only way to be sure.

I wish I didn't just bruttaly murder a pony.

Granted, you brutally tortured it instead.

I wish this post is on page 191.
